question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. person in white shirt
B. refrigerator with drinks
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The refrigerator with drinks is clearly in the background behind the person in the white shirt, who is standing closer to the foreground, making the refrigerator further away from the camera.
